subject: ATTENTION PLEASE!!!
body:
ATTENTION PLEASE!!!
GOOD DAY AND COMPLIMENTS TO YOU, I AM HERE TO INFORM YOU THAT THIS
DELIVER COURIER COMPANY, IT HAVE BEEN A VERY LONG TIME WE ARE WAITING
FOR YOU TO PROCEED ON YOUR PACKAGE DELIVERING, REGISTERED WITH US TO
DELIVERY TO YOU WITH REGISTRATION CODE IS (DCJKT00678G) SO WHAT IS
GOING ON?
BECAUSE OUR AGREEMENT IS TO DELIVERY YOUR PACKAGE TO YOUR DOOR STEP
WITHIN THE NEXT PERIOD OF 48HRS AS SOON AS WE RECEIVED OUR SECURITY
FEE OF $200.00.
I ADVICE YOU TO RE-CONFIRM YOUR INFORMATION'S AS BELLOW.
YOUR NAME:____
YOUR ADDRESS:____
YOUR TELEPHONE:____
WHATSAPP NUMBER:____
YOUR COUNTRY:____
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOUR URGENT RESPONSE FOR FINALIZATION.
BEST REGARDS,
CONTACT PERSON: MR PETER SAM
Telephone: (+229) 91129233  Also WhatsApp
E-MAIL: 
diplrosec@gmail.com

subject: Re:   ATTENTION PLEASE!!!
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding my package with the code DCJKT. I apologize for any delay in proceeding with the delivery.

Could you please provide me with more information about the security fee that needs to be paid? What is the purpose of this fee and how much is it?

I want to ensure that everything is in order before proceeding further. Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Wesley
